issue.title: add option to disable auto fixed-joint lumping in parser_urdf.cc

content.raw: Agreed, this should move to sdformat, and this sounds like an excellent plan. Please ping us with any troubles you have. I know there are several places where `parser_urdf.cc` has some known issues ( https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/38/force_torque-sensors-not-handled-by ), so let us know if you have any trouble and we'll try to help out. Thanks!
